page.title: 01LEISURE IN ROYTON
page.content: WHEN PEOPLE COME HOME FROM SCHOOL THEY WATCH T.V.OR PLAY OUT. SOME PEOPLE HAVE CLASSES IN KEEP FIT, DANCING, CUBS, GUIDES, BROWNIES, SCOUTS, BOYS' BRIGADE, MUSIC OR SWIMMING. MOST OF THESE ACTIVITIES TAKE PLACE IN OUR AREA. YOU CAN GO OUT OF OUR AREA TO FOOTBALL MATCHES, CINEMAS, ART GALLERIES, CANALS, CRAFT CENTRES, AND GARDEN CENTRES. IF IT IS RAINING PEOPLE PLAY ON COMPUTERS OR BOARD GAMES, LISTEN TO POP MUSIC, READ BOOKS AND COMICS. MUMS AND DADS GO TO THE PUB, READ OR WATCH T.V.
